mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.user_id, b.post_date, b.view_count, b.is_public, b.is_deleted, b.board_type, tb.price, tb.status, c.collection_id, c.name AS collection_name, bp.photo_id, bp.board_id AS bp_board_id, bp.filename, bp.origin_filename FROM board b LEFT JOIN trade_board tb ON b.board_id = tb.board_id LEFT JOIN collection c ON tb.collection_id = c.collection_id LEFT JOIN board_photo bp ON b.board_id = bp.board_id WHERE b.is_deleted = 0

SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.user_id, u.user_id as writer_id, u.nickname, u.end_date, b.post_date, b.view_count, b.is_public, b.is_deleted, b.board_type, b.maincategory_id, mc.category_name, tb.collection_id, tb.price, tb.status, tb.trade_type, c.name AS collection_name, bp.photo_id, bp.board_id AS bp_board_id, bp.filename, bp.origin_filename FROM board b LEFT JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN maincategory mc ON b.maincategory_id = mc.maincategory_id LEFT JOIN trade_board tb ON b.board_id = tb.board_id LEFT JOIN collection c ON tb.collection_id = c.collection_id LEFT JOIN board_photo bp ON b.board_id = bp.board_id WHERE b.board_id = #{no} AND b.is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO board_photo ( board_id, filename, origin_filename ) VALUES
( #{file.boardNo}, #{file.filename}, #{file.originFilename} )
INSERT INTO board ( title, content, user_id, post_date, board_type, maincategory_id ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{userNo}, NOW(), #{boardType}, #{maincategory.no} )
INSERT INTO trade_board ( board_id, collection_id, price, status, trade_type ) VALUES ( #{no}, #{collection.no}, #{price}, #{sellOrSoldStatus}, #{tradeType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, view_count = #{viewCount}, is_public = #{isPublic} WHERE board_id = #{no}
UPDATE trade_board SET status = 1 WHERE board_id = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.user_id, b.post_date, b.view_count, b.is_public, b.is_deleted, tb.collection_id, tb.price, tb.status FROM board b LEFT JOIN trade_board tb ON b.board_id = tb.board_id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND b.is_deleted = 0
SELECT board_id, title, content, user_id, post_date, view_count, is_public, is_deleted FROM board WHERE is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT #{no}

SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.user_id, b.post_date, b.view_count, b.is_public, b.is_deleted tb.trade_type, FROM board b WHERE b.is_deleted = 0 AND tb.trade_type = 'default' ORDER BY b.post_date DESC

SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.user_id, u.nickname, u.end_date, b.post_date, b.view_count, b.is_public, b.is_deleted, b.board_type, bp.photo_id, bp.filename, bp.origin_filename FROM board b LEFT JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN board_photo bp ON b.board_id = bp.board_id WHERE b.is_deleted = 0 AND b.is_popular = TRUE ORDER BY b.post_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.user_id, u.nickname, u.end_date, b.post_date, b.view_count, b.is_public, b.is_deleted, b.board_type, bp.photo_id, bp.filename, bp.origin_filename FROM board b LEFT JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN board_photo bp ON b.board_id = bp.board_id AND bp.photo_id = ( SELECT MIN(photo_id) FROM board_photo WHERE board_id = b.board_id ) WHERE b.is_deleted = 0 AND b.board_type = 'general' ORDER BY b.board_id DESC LIMIT #{pageNo}, #{pageCount}
